text:
hey guys so I am having yet another lunch with 
my extended family who have come from all over

the world to be here so we are at central 
embassy which is a brand new mall super fancy

and we're having dim sum for lunch and so it's 
really kind of an impressive dim sum so let me

show you what we have so as you can see there's 
an enormous amount of food on the table so I'll

just highlight a few this really cool thing is 
the crispy pork belly and I just really like it

because they made it so rectangular and then 
apparently the famous thing here is this lava

fowl here so most of you are familiar with the 
Chinese steamed buns but this one apparently has

gooey lava filling that is mainly salted duck 
eggs salted duck egg yolks so I've never had

it so this is exciting let's see how mmm it's 
bleeding wow this is really cool so apparently

when you first get it it's it whoa it's super hot 
so you got to be careful not to scorch yourself

well I don't know if you can see all that steam 
coming out but gotta make sure I blow his first

I don't if you know what salted duck egg 
yolk tastes like it's got that sort of

a creamy a little bit of a sandy 
texture super soft buns and yeah

really interesting creamy definitely a 
sweet dessert eat I think I'm a fan of

custard buns to begin with so this 
is this takes it to another level
